c.e:
<>
					{selectedLibrary && (
						<>
							<PanelHeader>
								<SolaceTypography variant="h2">{selectedLibrary.displayName}</SolaceTypography>
								<SolaceButton variant="icon" onClick={() => handleSelectLibrary(null)}>
									<CloseIcon />
								</SolaceButton>
							</PanelHeader>
							<Container>
								<ConnectionDetails service={service} showMsgVpnName={selectedLibrary.protocol.usesVPN} />
								<HostUris hostUris={hostUris} showTrustStore={selectedLibrary.protocol.type === "smf"} truststoreUri={truststoreUri} dataQa="connect" />
								<SolaceButton variant="outline" onClick={handleShowLibraryDialog}>
									<Trans id="id_get_started">Get Started</Trans>
								</SolaceButton>
							</Container>
						</>
					)}
					{selectedTool && (
						<>
							<PanelHeader>
								<SolaceTypography variant="h2">{selectedTool.name}</SolaceTypography>
								<SolaceButton variant="icon" onClick={() => handleSelectTool(null)}>
									<CloseIcon />
								</SolaceButton>
							</PanelHeader>
							<Container>
								<ConnectionTool service={service} showMsgVpnName={selectedTool.showMsgVpnName} title={selectedTool.credentials} />
							</Container>
						</>
					)}
				</>
